//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_2;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution                c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio               c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c7       1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   SceneColorTexture            s1       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2             s4       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c5, 1, 0.5, 6, 5
    def c6, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c8, 150, -0.00100000005, 1000, -0.100000001
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.w
    dcl_texcoord7 v2.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --git --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --ignore-parse-errors CRC32_B8AE147B_1068.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    mad r0.xy, vPos, c0, c0.zwzw
    mul r0.xy, r0, v2.w
    texld_pp r1, c5, s0
    mul r1.xyz, r1.x, c4
    mul oC0.xyz, r1, c7
    texld r1, v0, s3
    mul r0.w, r1.w, v1.w
    mul r1.xy, c5.zwzw, v0
    texld r1, r1, s4
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r2, c6, s2
      add r1.y, -r2.y, v2.w
      mad r0.z, r2.x, r1.y, r0.x
      mov r0.xy, r0.zyzw
      mov r0.z, v2.w
    else
      mov r0.z, v2.w
    endif
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r2.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r2.zw, c6.y
    texldl r2, r2, s1
    add r0.x, r2.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c6.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c6.w, r0.x
    add r0.y, -r1.x, c5.x
    mul r0.z, r0.y, c8.x
    mad r0.x, c2.x, r0.x, -v2.w
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c8.x, c8.y
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    cmp r0.y, r0.y, r0.z, c8.z
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.w, r0.x, c8.w
    frc r0.y, -r0.x
    add_sat_pp oC0.w, r0.y, r0.x

// approximately 40 instruction slots used (6 texture, 34 arithmetic)
